nodes.text: Evil Has Its Eyes On You

Evil Has Its Eyes On You was a propaganda poster created by COMPOR artist Donclode Onstruss for the Galactic Republic. It depicts the Separatist firebrand leader Count Dooku in the center of the poster alongside the superimposed image of the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' Droid Army, the infamous General Grievous' helmet looming from behind in an ominous manner, as well as yellow High Galactic Font declaring the word "Evil" up top and "Has Its Eyes On You" at the bottom, as well as much smaller white font in Aurebesh with the Republic crest at the bottom.
